overlays.name: DWI-b0
overlays.descr: Diffusion Weighted Image with zero gradient strength.

overlays.name: cFA
overlays.descr: colored Fractional Anisotropy, with RGB-colors representing the orientation of the first eigenvector of the diffusion tensor. R=left-right, G=inferior-superior, B=anterior-posterior

config.templateName: Population-averaged DTI atlas of the Sprague Dawley rat (Veraart et al. 2011)
config.slicePositionDescription: posterior(-) or anterior(+) distance to Anterior Commissure

definingCitations.title: Population-averaged diffusion tensor imaging atlas of the Sprague Dawley rat brain.

aboutHtml: The population-averaged 3D DTI atlas of the normal adult Sprague Dawley rat brain has been developed by Jelle Veraart under supervision of Jan Sijbers from the iMinds-Vision Lab at the University of Antwerp.

The origin is defined as "Junction of the rostral and dorsal tangential planes of the anterior commissure with the mid-sagittal plane", and corresponds to voxel (123,103,107), where voxel (0,0,0) is the most (left,posterior,inferior).
